claims.object: point-to-point system composed of two or more connected parties or devices that can communicate with one another in both directions

surface_layer.definition: A point-to-point system composed of two or more connected parties or devices that can communicate with one another in both directions.
common_uses: Simultaneous communication in both directions between two connected parties
Providing a reverse path for the monitoring and remote adjustment of equipment in the field

deep_layer.mechanism: Uses two or more communication channels to send and receive data simultaneously.
